attributes.action: Give any young person carrying a knife or other weapon the choice of 5 years in jail or 3 years of very hard army training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Society has bombarded young people with films and magazines filled with the most gruesome violence and then it wonders why they do what they do!
Instead of just jailing them, offer them the alternative of a period of tough army life which will make decent men of them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
